metadata.title: CVE-2023-6176 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - high
metadata.description:
A null pointer dereference flaw was found in the Linux kernel API for thecryptographic algorithm scatterwalk functionality. This issue occurs when auser constructs a malicious packet with specific socket configuration,which could allow a local user to crash the system or escalate theirprivileges on the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6176` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.6.0-14-generic - 6.6.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-14-generic - 6.6.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-14-generic-64k - 6.6.0-14.14
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-1001-aws - 6.6.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-1001-azure - 6.6.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-1001-gcp - 6.6.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-14-lowlatency - 6.6.0-14.14.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-14-lowlatency-64k - 6.6.0-14.14.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.6.0-1001-oracle - 6.6.0-1001.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.6.0-14.14').
linux-aws package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.6.0-1001.1').
linux-azure package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.6.0-1001.1').
linux-gcp package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.6.0-1001.1').
linux-gke package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-lowlatency package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.6.0-14.14.1').
linux-oracle package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.6.0-1001.1').
linux-raspi package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
